attributes.action: adopt legislation to charge at a higher rate for electricity used to illuminate advertising hoarding to subsidise renewable energy technology.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In the dead of night, there are thousands of bus shelters with glowing signs, huge illuminated hoardings proclaiming special offers and other illuminated signage. All buy electricity at a cheap rate... Start charging consumers of electricity, such as this, who are profligately wasting energy at a much higher rate, suggested 50p per unit. This would dis-incentivise wasting of energy and these funds could be used to pay a guaranteed price for renewables to subsidise their adoption.
